glsa.title: LibXfont, LibXfont2: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in LibXfont and Libxfont2, the worst of which could allow attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in LibXfont and LibXfont2. Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

impact.p: Local attackers could obtain sensitive information or possibly cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
